const getCourseDetailPath=()=>{if(props.path&&props.path.includes('course_content')){const urlParams=new URLSearchParams(props.path.split('?')[1]);const courseId=urlParams.get('id');return`/course-detail?id=${courseId}`;}return props.path;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"cards__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"cards__item__link",to:getCourseDetailPath(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("figure",{className:"cards__item__pic-wrap","data-category":props.label,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"cards__item__img",alt:"Course Image",src:props.src})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cards__item__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"cards__item__text",children:props.text}),props.instructor&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"cards__item__instructor",children:["By ",props.instructor]}),props.rating&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cards__item__rating",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\u2B50 ",props.rating]}),props.students&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["(",props.students," students)"]})]}),props.price&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cards__item__price",children:["$",props.price]})]})]})})});}export default CardItem;
